attributes.action: reimburse all UK vehicle owners five pence for every mile driven, funded by a modified Fuel Duty scheme, as a way of rewarding fuel efficient motoring.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Vehicle Fuel Duty should be split into two components, one refundable and one not.

The value of the refundable component, x pence per litre, will define the target fuel efficiency level, the target mpg. Motorists that achieve the target mpg, over the course of a year, will get a full refund of this component. Those who exceed the target will make a profit and those who fall short will make a loss.

Initially the combined value of the two components should not exceed the current level of Fuel Duty.
